snippet: At a time of inflation caused by Western economic sanctions, Iran may face difficulty getting more banknotes printed.
abstract: At least three European companies that have been providing currency production services to Iran have stopped doing business there, making it difficult for Iran to print enough money during a time of inflation caused by economic sanctions.
lead_paragraph: At a time of inflation caused by Western economic sanctions, Iran may face difficulty getting more banknotes printed.

headline.main: Iran Sanctions May Cut Supply of Currency
headline.print_headline: Iran Sanctions May Cut Supply Of Currency
